entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 13
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo from the special event 1983-1106 Diwālī Pūjā, London, UK has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution (tif-neg) from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 69 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: UK 1983.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 11
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 33 Photos from the special event 1986-0921 Śhrī Mahālakṣhmī Pūjā, Mechelen, Belgium have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution, 4 medium resolutions, and 28 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 61 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Belgium 1986.
The event has as well 1 photo Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
